Sentencas: Within the framework of developing reversible solid oxide fuel cells/solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOFCs/SOECs), we have engaged in the design of high-performance electrodes.
Titulo: High-performance electrodes for reversible solid oxide fuel cell/solid oxide electrolysis cell: Ni-Co dispersed ceria hydrogen electrodes

Sentencas: Facile production of hollow spherical particles of samaria-doped ceria (SDC) decorated with Ni-Co alloy catalysts (Ni100-xCox/SDC, X = 0-50 atom%), nanometers in size, was adopted.
Titulo: High-performance electrodes for reversible solid oxide fuel cell/solid oxide electrolysis cell: Ni-Co dispersed ceria hydrogen electrodes

Sentencas: A distinctive microstructure was observed in the hydrogen electrode fabricated with this composite powder.
Titulo: High-performance electrodes for reversible solid oxide fuel cell/solid oxide electrolysis cell: Ni-Co dispersed ceria hydrogen electrodes

Sentencas: The cobalt addition played a significant role in evolution of the microstructure and effectively enlarged the electrochemical reaction zone.
Titulo: High-performance electrodes for reversible solid oxide fuel cell/solid oxide electrolysis cell: Ni-Co dispersed ceria hydrogen electrodes

Sentencas: Under SOFC/SOEC reversible operation, the optimal performance characterized by a comparatively low ohmic resistance and high electrocatalytic activity was achieved with the Ni80Co20/SDC composition.
Titulo: High-performance electrodes for reversible solid oxide fuel cell/solid oxide electrolysis cell: Ni-Co dispersed ceria hydrogen electrodes

Sentencas: At 900 degrees C and an overpotential of 0.1 V, the current density reached remarkably high values of 0.18 and 0.37 A cm(-2) in SOFC and SOEC operation, respectively.
Titulo: High-performance electrodes for reversible solid oxide fuel cell/solid oxide electrolysis cell: Ni-Co dispersed ceria hydrogen electrodes
